hero.title: I'm a Software Developer with a passion for building modern and user-friendly applications.

journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: I started out in a different field after graduating upper secondary school with a electrician degree, I quickly realised it wasn't something I wanted to pursue long-term. I've always been interested in technology and programming, but never pursued it until later in life, when I decided to make a change.
journey.descriptionTwo: I'm currently studying Software Development at Nackademin, focusing on both backend and frontend development. What started as an interest quickly turned into a passion, and I'm always striving to learn more and improve my skills.
journey.descriptionThree: Right now, I'm looking for an internship where I can apply my skills in a real-world environment.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: I'm dedicated to writing clean, efficient code that not only works well but is also easy to understand and maintain. I believe that great user experiences and teamwork are the keys to success.

coreValues.title: Core Values
values: Solving problems with effective and practical solutions

hobbies.title: Outside of Work
hobbies.description: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring new technologies and planning future projects. I've also been a gamer since childhood and love playing a variety of games.
hobbies.descriptionTwo: Beyond gaming, I enjoy spending time outdoors. Walks and discovering new places help me recharge and find inspiration.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Check out my projects that I have done for my studies as well as personal projects.

projectDescription.alpha_portal_frontend: A React-based frontend for managing projects, clients, and users. Connects to a RESTful backend API and features responsive UI components built with HTML, CSS, and React.
projectDescription.alpha_portal_backend: An ASP.NET Core Web API for managing projects and clients. Uses Entity Framework Core and SQL Server for data handling, along with JWT for security.
projectDescription.ventixe_frontend: An ASP.NET Core MVC application for the Ventixe event platform. Combines server-side rendering with client-side JavaScript and communicates with backend services via REST APIs and gRPC.
projectDescription.ventixe_events_backend: A microservice built with ASP.NET Core Web API for managing events on the Ventixe platform. Uses Entity Framework Core and is deployed on Azure.
projectDescription.ventixe_imageservice_backend: A microservice for image uploads and management. Built with ASP.NET Core Web API and integrated with Azure storage services.
projectDescription.my_portfolio: My personal portfolio built with React and TypeScript. Uses Tailwind CSS for styling and showcases my projects and skills.
projectDescription.hederlige_harrys: A group project website for a fictional car dealership. Built with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and vanilla JavaScript as a collaborative exercise.
projectDescription.movie_booking_react: A React application for booking movie tickets with seat selection functionality. Features responsive design and manages the booking flow with state management.
projectDescription.shotgun_form: A Windows game implementing Shotgun mechanics with a computer opponent. Built with C# and WinForms.
projectDescription.address_form: A desktop application for managing contacts with CRUD operations. Uses WinForms and SQL Server.
projectDescription.ad_form: A Windows Forms application for managing advertisements. Supports database operations with SQL Server and form-based validation.
projectDescription.bowling_game: A console application simulating bowling and member registration. Developed to demonstrate design patterns and OOP principles.
projectDescription.bakery_shop: A static website for a bakery built with HTML and CSS. Created as a first project to learn the basics of web development.

skills.title: Skills & Tools
skills.description: Here are some of the technologies and tools I've worked with as well as currently learning.

footer.title: Rami Obaid
footer.description: A passionate Software Developer who strives for solving problems with effective solutions.
